microservice.infrastructure.services

Interface CRUDServiceInterface<E extends ModelInterface>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionService, FileResourceService, GroupService, MicroServiceOptionService, MicroServiceService, PageInjectionService, TopMenuLinkService, UserMicroServiceOptionService, UserService

    public interface CRUDServiceInterface<E extends ModelInterface>
    Default CRUD interface for services. create: Create edit: Edit/Update delete: Delete findById: Get 1 item findAll: Get all item(s)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      E create(E e)
      Create an Object of type ModelInterface and returns the object
      void delete(int id)
      Deletes an Object, based on id
      void edit(E e)
      Edit an Object of type ModelInterface
      java.util.List<E> findAll()
      Returns all Objectse
      java.util.List<E> findAll(int microserviceid)
      Returns all Objects that are associated with the microservice
      E findById(int id)
      Finds an Object based on id
